did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physdesc: Collection consists of one folder of ten poll books.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: New Market Poll Books, Collection #2089, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased by Friends of Carrier Library at Green Valley Auction Barn near Mt. Crawford, July 23, 1994.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Poll books are for elections held in New Market, Lee Township\Magisterial District, Shenandoah County, VA, in May and November 1873, November 1874, May and November 1875 and 1877, November 1878, and May and November 1879. Each book is paperbound and contains the oaths of judges and clerks of the election and signatures of electors.
